name: storra
author: Bastian Krol
description: a generic stand-alone data store with a RESTful interface which can be configured to use different storage engines (MongoDB, nStore, node-dirty, ...), all encapsulated behind the same REST API

comment_devDependencies.jasmine-node: jasmine-node 1.2.x needs to be installed to execute specs, but prefers to be installed globally which is not possible via package.json - npm install -g jasmine-node@1.2.x
comment_devDependencies.cucumber.js: cucumber.js needs to be installed to execute acceptance tests, but prefers to be installed globally which is not possible via package.json - npm install -g cucumber
comment_devDependencies.supervisor: Using supervisor during development is also highly recommended, though not required. npm install -g supervisor.
